examples: When the company had already lost a major client, the sales team suggested a new strategy.
An engineer suggested driving a tunnel through the Judean hills.
Recent economic performance suggests that a major crisis is at hand.
I suggest you wear another for today.
That last game suggests that we have been getting ahead of ourselves in praising the team's progress.
words.defineEn: to mention or put forward an idea, proposition, plan, etc. for further consideration or possible action
words.defineVi: để đề cập hoặc đưa ra một ý tưởng, đề xuất, kế hoạch, vv để xem xét thêm hoặc hành động có thể

examples: He used daikon as a natural remedy for congestion.

words.defineVi: một phương pháp điều trị hoặc thuốc cho một căn bệnh hoặc để giảm đau không nghiêm trọng

examples: State television didn't cover Kim Jong-il's ailments.

words.defineEn: an illness, often a minor one

examples: Has your headache gone yet?

All that driving has given me a headache.
words.defineEn: a pain in the head, usually persistent
words.defineVi: đau đầu, thường dai dẳng

examples: You both wake up with violent stomachaches.
These could be anything from backaches and stomachaches to morning sickness and food cravings.

What happens is my mouth swells up, my throat swells up, I get hives, I get hives in my lungs, I can't breathe, horrible stomachache, and it lasts for three hours.
So infrequent bowel movements and/or hard stool and/or stomachaches after you've eaten things could be a sign that you're stressed.
words.defineEn: a pain in or near someone's stomach
words.defineVi: một cơn đau trong hoặc gần dạ dày của ai đó

examples: There are a few different things that can cause earaches.
And that’s why an earache is painful.
If you’ve ever had an earache, you know just how much that can make your ears hurt!
words.defineEn: a pain inside the ear
words.defineVi: một cơn đau bên trong tai

examples: Chewing on a clove can help alleviate a toothache.

Two of them were stationed 570 kilometers away when one got a toothache.
And if these workers don't want dental services and prefer being paid in something else like flat-screen TV's, then you have to find TV manufacturers that have toothaches.

examples: These could be anything from backaches and stomachaches to morning sickness and food cravings.
WILLIAM BRANGHAM: Meaning, so you could have people getting backaches after getting their shots and make an association, but they may have no bearing whatsoever.
words.defineEn: a pain in someone's back
words.defineVi: một nỗi đau ở lưng của ai đó

examples: He feels the cold a lot.

words.defineVi: một tình trạng khi bạn cảm thấy đau ở cổ họng, thường do vi khuẩn hoặc vi rút gây ra

examples: The child is still running a fever

examples: Take your pick.
